document_data.name: Army of Gold
document_data.mainbody: The '''Army of Gold''' was the name of the expedition of [[gold dwarves]] that set out from the [[Great Rift]] to reclaim the glory of [[Deep Shanatar]], the lost kingdom of the [[shield dwarves]].
document_data.History: In the caves of [[Taark Shanat]], the Army of Gold entered into the [[War of Gold and Gloom]] with the [[gray dwarves]] of the [[Dunspeirrin|Underspires]] around [[1369 DR]].
